name: Cocktelleria
description:
-----  Overview  -----

Cocktelleria is a bartending simulation experience.
Explore the surroundings to gather ingredients, then go back to the bar counter and start cutting - slicing - pouring - blending - squeezing through a selection of unique recipes, in order to satisfy your impatient customers!

It doesn't matter wether you are new to the art of bartending or a seasoned veteran, Cocktelleria got you covered: featuring two different levels of difficulty (as well as a chilling free-play mode), you will be able to learn and challenge yourself regardless of your skill level.

----- The project  -----

Cocktelleria is a university project, developed for the Virtual Reality course (a.y. 2021/2022), part of the 'Computer Engineering' and 'Cinema and Media Engineering' master's degrees offered by Politecnico di Torino.

The students who partecipated in this project are:

  • Forma Giuseppe - 3D Artist, Graphic Artist
  • Merletti Alberto - Programmer, Sound Designer
  • Pizzinga Claudia - 3D Artist
  • Raso Federico - Programmer
  • Zhang Yuyang - Graphic Artist
-----  Controls  -----

The game is played by using mouse and keyboard.
This is a list of the basic controls:

  • W A S D:  movement
  • Mouse movement:  rotate camera
  • E:  interact
  • ESC:  open menu

You will learn advanced controls and specific actions as you progress in the game, or by playing through the tutorial.

----  Third parties  ----

Several 3rd party tools and assets have been used during the development of this project:

  • Unity asset Apartment Kit by Brick Project Studio
  • Unity asset ArchViz Vol 1 - Scotland URP by DevDen
  • Unity asset HDRP Furniture Pack by Tridify
  • Unity asset Free Decorative Plants by Nobiax / Yughues
  • Unity asset World Materials Free by Avionx
  • Unity asset Quick Outline by Chris Nolet
  • The animations' library Mixamo
  • The 3D models' library Sketchfab
----  Installation  ----
  1. Unzip the downloaded package;
  2. Run Cocktelleria.exe;
  3. Enjoy :)
